message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product for a price that I think is very reasonable, considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of this product, $1200000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000, which is still a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think.

I understand that $1200000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. Considering the value you placed on the product, I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1050000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $1050000, but that's still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $950000, which is a fair compromise. This is my final offer, as I'm not comfortable going any higher.

I understand that you're trying to find a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $1000000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
